title: 386. Q&AF: Rebounding The Pandemic Losses, Staying Focused On Your Goals & Dealing With Different Personalities In Business
itunes:title: 386. Q&AF: Rebounding The Pandemic Losses, Staying Focused On Your Goals & Dealing With Different Personalities In Business
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on regaining losses in your business due to the pandemic, how to stay focused on your goals when a lot is happening in your life, and the best way to handle different types of personalities as a leader.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on regaining losses in your business due to the pandemic, how to stay focused on your goals when a lot is happening in your life, and the best way to handle different types of personalities as a leader.
